website_summaries.verdict: The KEEN Whisper is an undeniably comfortable hiking sandal that excels in durability. It’s a lightweight footgear with a fast-drying upper and grippy outsole. Its almost non-existent break-in time and protective toe box make it even more praiseworthy.It’s not all hits for the Whisper, however, as issues with its width, arch support, and heel straps are misses that cannot be ignored. To summarize, this lightweight hiking sandal from KEEN seems to scream a lot of advantages.
pros: A majority of sandal-loving hikers praise the KEEN Whisper’s satisfactory comfort
The sandal has received aces from a large percentage of reviewers for its lightweight build
Its quick-drying upper is a definite plus for many wearers
A couple of experts commend this sandal’s durability, and many consumers couldn’t agree more
The KEEN Whisper requires minimal-to-zero break-in time, based on a number of user reviews
Many hikers find the sandal’s grip on inclined surfaces quite impressive
According to the testers of a reputable gear review website, they feel mightily secure with the Whisper’s sturdy toe cap
According to a lot of impressed verified purchasers, putting it on and taking it off is effortless
cons: A good number of buyers were left in disdain after discovering the sandal’s narrow width
Many loyal KEEN patrons were not too thrilled about the Whisper’s insufficient arch support
Some owners didn’t like the performance of the heel strap
They said that their heels slipped through the vent hole below the strap numerous times

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish for Keen's
customer_reviews.text: worst pair of Keen's I've ever had and I've been buying Keen foot ware for at least 15 years. They were advertised has having the Keen metatomical footbed, they don't. Comfortable when I first put them on after about an hour they started to pinch at the sides, they don't have the arch support I expected. Probably the reason they were so cheap for Keen's, these are bargain basement and not up to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It has taken me a long time to spend this kind of money on a pair of sandals but these Keen ones are worth it. They are very hard wearing, last for years, stylish and remain intact on the top of the sandal for a long time, unlike most cheaper sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Aussiekid

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my twin sister. She needed something robust and comfortable for a holiday in Sri Lanka. She loves them. Fit was perfect (she has very broad feet) and so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Susan Colquhoun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, seem hard wearing considering the use they’ve already had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These sandals were recommended by a friend
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were recommended by a friend. I am a half size and was advised to go to the size below. They fit a treat, are very comfortable and unlike flip flops or another pair of walking sandals I have, do not have a toe post. The colour is gorgeous and I am delighted with them. For walking sandals they are a good price and I would buy this make, Keen, again. They arrived very promptly and were well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Marshall

customer_reviews.title: fandabbydozey
customer_reviews.text: I have slightly wider than average feet, and flat feet too. These are some of the most comfortable sandals ive ever owned. Although sole is cushioned and feels nice and springy it is a little on the flat side, rather than moulding to the shape of your feet, which might be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mangogirl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for value
customer_reviews.text: Great for long walks and it doesn’t rub while being wet
customer_reviews.author: littlelaurita

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks ok
customer_reviews.text: Inflated and deflates really well. Nice firm blow up bed.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: the best !
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I wore the last ones out they lasted me about 3 years. Well worth the money. Very comfy look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo67

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this my girl to replace her Cros. This is excellent for outdoor, stay on the feet and dry quickly. With those reasons and bought a second pair for my other daughter with different colour.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Luv them!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely luv them! So comfortable, from very first wearing of them.
customer_reviews.author: Noony

customer_reviews.title: Sandals worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service and sandals is amazing fit perfectly nice colour. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Razantaite

customer_reviews.title: Thank-you
customer_reviews.text: Thank-you for a swift delivery.oh! and the price was right too!
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore for the first time on a 8 hour car drive to Cornwall and not a blister in site - so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, nice colour but too narrow compared to other keen products
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Design fault
customer_reviews.text: Lovely fit for the narrower foot but has a design fault. The ankle surround needs to be made of webbing or leather. The current lycra based fabric is not strong enough and causes the foot to slide out the back of the sandal. I would recommend you go for one of the other Keen designs with a better ankle design.
customer_reviews.author: T Pim

product_meta.title: Keen Womens WHISPER W-BARBERRY/NEUTRAL GRAY Sandals
product_meta.description: The perfect warm weather partner The Keen Whisper Women's Walking Sandals feature technologies that make water filled days supremely comfortable with its washable polyester webbing upper and CMEVA (compression molded ethyl vinyl acetate) midsole meaning the sandals feel comfortable and supportive in the upper and cushioned and protected underfoot. Added to this a lace capture system which allows for a comfortable and secure fit and you have a sandal that is a must have for any warm day filled with both water and land based activities. For added comfort and support, Keen employ hybrid-ology in the form of a metatomical EVA footbed. This is an anatomically designed internal support mechanism which provides support for the arch and metatarsals and cradles the natural contours of the foot. Metatarsals + anatomical = metatomical. Enhanced traction underfoot is achieved through a multi-directional lug pattern on the outsole which ensures you stay stable over rough terrain or or wet rocks.
feature_bullets: Features elastic cording which gives this sandal a secure fit
Hydrophobic mesh lining. Non-marking rubber outsole. Compression molded EVA midsole
METATOMICAL FOOTBED DESIGN. This internal support mechanism is anatomically engineered to provide excellent arch support and cradle the natural contours of the foot.
All KEEN water sandals are machine washable. Use a small amount of detergent, wash on gentle cycle and air dry.
